body:
So it has come to my attention MCZone rotation servers have been decreased to just 1 server (MCZone01), which was only comprised of "Smaller MCZone maps"... and Quintus, which was added from the "Larger MCZone maps" rotation (which is disabled!).
So, since MCZone01 is the only one working, I've swapped things around a bit:
MCZone01 has been swapped with MCZone03, which is "All of them" MCZone maps, meaning you'll find all of MCZone maps in MCZone01 now instead.

The rotation goes as following:
- Fissura
- Divines
- Senex1
- Ternio
- VenomousDTM
- Zalidor
- VenomousTDM
- RigorMortis
- Senex2
- Rendezvous1
- CastleAdventure
- Quintus
- Crusade
- Decay
- Rendezvous2
- DustDevils
- Frostbite

Have fun.

title: Small Notice regarding MCZone rotations.

replies.body: Thanks, all these are fun to play and good maps!:)
